description: Theta series of 6-dimensional 8-modular lattice of minimal norm 4.
comments: Associated with permutations in Mathieu group M24 of shape (8)^2(4)(2)(1)^2. - _Michael Somos_, Nov 24 2007
links: M. Koike, Mathieu group M24 and modular forms, Nagoya Math. J., 99 (1985), 147-157. MR0805086 (87e:11060)
G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
formula: G.f. is a period 1 Fourier series which satisfies f(-1 / (8 t)) = (512)^(1/2) (t/i)^3 f(t) where q = exp(2 Pi i t). - _Michael Somos_, Nov 24 2007A136028(n) = a(n) + 6 * A030207(n). - _Michael Somos_, Apr 19 2015
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ With[{e1 = QPochhammer[ x] QPochhammer[ x^8], e2 = QPochhammer[ x^2] QPochhammer[ x^4]}, e2^9 / e1^6 - 6 x e1^2 e2], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Apr 19 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
